derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French carpentrie, Old French charpenterie, from charpentier (see carpenter)

entry.def: Carpentry is the activity of making and repairing wooden things.

means.word_mean: 1. the craft of a carpenter: making things out of wood
